messages.title: I've had ENOUGH of this...
messages.content: TAX DODGERS, BANKERS BONUSES, MPs PAY RISES, MPs EXPENSES, OPEN-BORDERS, ZERO-HOUR CONTRACTS

messages.title: The Truth About UKIP
messages.content: Keep the NHS Free at the point of delivery. A points-based fairer immigration system. No Tax on the minimum wage. IGNORE THE LIBLABCON LIES

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Catherine Reilly wants more care options for the elderly.
UKIP proposes to provide free hospital parking.
The party aims to scrap green taxes.
One of the policies includes reducing energy bills.
Keep the NHS Free at the point of delivery. An additional £3bn for NHS frontline services.
No Tax on the minimum wage.
UKIP will scrap tuition fees for Science, Tech, Engineering, Maths and Medical degrees.
Priority social housing for local residents and returning ex-service men and women.

issues.education: UKIP will scrap tuition fees for Science, Tech, Engineering, Maths and Medical degrees.
issues.health: Keep the NHS Free at the point of delivery. An additional £3bn for NHS frontline services.

housing.content: Priority social housing for local residents and returning ex-service men and women.

leaflet.personalStatement: Remember 'Broken Promises' Brokenshire, the Immigration Minister? I do, he was the current MP for Old Bexley & Sidcup. If you feel, like me, that he's done a terrible job controlling immigration then please vote for Ukip and an Australian-style points-based and much fairer immigration system. I'm determined to fight for a fairer Great Britain for our elderly and vulnerable, for those that work hard and those that deserve it.

images.caption: Leaflets from Catherine Reilly's campaign featuring key messages and policies.
